title: Aural Micro Suction Training - Ear Wax Clinic
description: Training for registered ear care professionals, medical practitioners, registered nurses with aural care experience and qualified audiologists.
rawContent:
Aural Micro Suction Training

We only train qualified, registered, and/or supervised ear care professionals, medical practitioners, audiologists, hearing care assistants, registered nurses, and health care assistants with aural care experience. You should already have a high level of expertise and knowledge, so we can focus on developing the practical skills needed to complete the procedure safely, confidently, and professionally.

Training & Equipment Packages start from £1,696.40 + vat

 

Just Training £395.00 + vat

View our training calendar

Hosting a Training Day at Your Practice

If you would prefer to have your training on-site in the UK or Ireland, we are happy for people to host venues. Hosts are required to organise a suitable room and for doing this we will travel to your practice/department and provide training on-site. We prefer to train in groups of 4 and we can supplement numbers with other trainees looking for training places in your area. Therefore, if only one person requires training at your practice/department, it's not a problem, we'll do the rest. Costs are the same as attending our organised venues and we normally need 3-6 weeks notice to arrange everything.

Please call us to discuss your onsite training micro suction training requirements on 0151 662 0292
